# unit

**Instance Property**

The increment of time that a subscription period is specified in.

## Declaration

```swift
var unit: SKProduct.PeriodUnit { get }
```

## Discussion

The units used to specify a subscription period include day, week, month, and year, as defined in [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKProduct/PeriodUnit].

To calculate the duration of one subscription period, multiply the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKProductSubscriptionPeriod/unit] by the number of units ([doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKProductSubscriptionPeriod/numberOfUnits]).

## Getting Subscription Period Details

- **numberOfUnits**: The number of units per subscription period.
- **SKProduct.PeriodUnit**: Values representing the duration of an interval, from a day up to a year.
